channel.title: Deleting help needed
channel.description:
ok I have a problem i want to make airs, but when i click to make i make 28 airs but only have 1 ess deleted i changed number to 28 in this code
[code]deleteItem(1436,getItemSlot(1436), 28);[/code]
But it still only deletes one ess, can anyone help me with this problem please i well thank you *hint* after :D
MoparRuler

item.title: Deleting help needed
item.dc:creator: @moparRuler moparRuler
item.description:
@moparRuler wrote:

here is the code

if (useItemID == 1436 && atObjectID == 2478); { addItem(556, 28); addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[20]), 20); deleteItem(1436,getItemSlot(1436), 28); sendMessage("You made some air runes"); }

anyone? anyone know whats wrong

Read full topic
